question: The "Lake Inari" is located in which country?
explanation: Lake Inari, also known as Lake Inarijavi, is the third-largest lake in Finland. It is located in the northern part of the Lapland region, north of the Arctic Circle, in Finland. This lake is culturally and historically significant for the Sami people of Finland, as it houses the Graveyard Island and the sacrifice place of the ancient inhabitants.
